Sentencas: The benefits of a system combining high- and low-temperature fuel cell types have been assessed using computer predictions.
Titulo: A study of SOFC-PEM hybrid systems

Sentencas: A high-temperature solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) may be used to produce electricity and carry out fuel reforming simultaneously.
Titulo: A study of SOFC-PEM hybrid systems

Sentencas: The exhaust stream from an SOFC can be processed by shift reactors and supplied to a low-temperature polymer electrolyte membrane (PEM) cell.
Titulo: A study of SOFC-PEM hybrid systems

Sentencas: The overall efficiency predicted for the hybrid system is shown to be significantly better than a Reformer-PEM system or an SOFC-only system.
Titulo: A study of SOFC-PEM hybrid systems

Sentencas: Approximate capital and running cost estimates also show significant benefits compared to the other two systems.
Titulo: A study of SOFC-PEM hybrid systems
